name: LN_REND_SEC_ID
description:
This table holds additional IDs used to identify the rendering provider for the service line to the other payor. 





The LN_REND_SEC_QUAL, LN_REND_SEC_ID, and LN_REND_SEC_PYR tables are related to one another.  The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_REND_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds additional IDs for the rendering provider.
